thread.title: Who are the five fastest players at each Premier League club? We crunch the numbers
thread.title_full: Who are the five fastest players at each Premier League club? We crunch the numbers

author: Liam Corless
title: Who are the five fastest players at each Premier League club? We crunch the numbers
text:
Sport Who are the five fastest players at each Premier League club? We crunch the numbers Here, we take a look at the five fastest players at each of the 20 top flight clubs... Share These five Premier League stars are pretty speedy (Photo: Arsenal FC/AFP/Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Southampton striker Shane Long is the fastest player in the Premier League. 
No player in the top flight has been clocked running at a quicker speed than the Irishman, who reached 35.31km/h at his fastest this season. 
Here, we take a look at the five fastest players at each of the 20 Premier League clubs: 
*All speeds are kilometres per hour Arsenal Theo Walcott is Arsenal's fastest player (Photo: REUTERS) 
Theo Walcott, 34.78
